what_it_gives: Daily/weekly chart CSV exports; historical backfill to seed baseline and detect first appearances
key_fields: track, artist, streams, rank, date, region

what_it_gives: Channel uploads + video stats; can snapshot forward; no historical timeseries without repeated snapshots
key_fields: videoId, channelId, publishedAt, viewCount, likeCount, commentCount

what_it_gives: Tag charts + top tracks/artists; can provide historical charts at period endpoints
Daily pageviews per artist page; easy historical backfill
Artist/recording IDs, ISRCs, credits; identity resolution + collab graph
key_fields: artist mbid, recording mbid, ISRC, relationships

what_it_gives: Enrich entity graph (labels, countries, genres, relationships)
Subreddit/post signals; mention velocity; good early buzz proxy
